踾字的基本解释

踾
fú
〔踾踧（
c?）〕ａ．聚；ｂ．迫蹙貌；ｃ．迫。

踾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》方六切，入屋，非。］
见“踾踧”。
[②]［bì］
［《廣韻》符逼切，入職，並。］
见“踾2撲”。

踾字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踾； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1230第13
【廣韻】【集韻】?方六切，音福。踾踧，聚貌。【馬融·長笛賦】踾踧攢仄。　又【集韻】筆力切，音逼。踾踧，行迫。　又拍逼切，音堛。【玉篇】踏地聲。　又弼力切，音愎。踏也。

踾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
踾字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Turn around
fú
〔踾踧(
c?)] a. Gather; b. Forced to be frowning; c. force.
Turn around
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" square six cuts, enter the house, non. ]
See "踾踧".
[②]［bì］
["Guangyun" is forced to cut, entered, and merged. ]
See "Quan 2 Pounce".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　踾; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1230 and 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Square six cut, sound blessing.踾踧, gather appearance. 【Ma Rong·Flute Fu】Ranked around.　[Jiyun] The pen is sharp and the sound is strong. Leaving, compelling.　Shoot and cut again, the sound. [Jade articles] The sound of stepping on the ground.　 Cut again, the sound is shocked. Step too.
